meanings.definition: Cooked with curry powder or spices.
meanings.sent1: The curried chicken had a spicy flavor.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the curried vegetables for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The curried rice made everyone's taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: The curried dish added a burst of flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the curried stew filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To prepare food with curry powder or spices.
meanings.sent1: She curried the chicken before roasting it.
meanings.sent2: He curried the meat to enhance its taste.
meanings.sent3: The chef curried the sauce with a secret blend of spices.
meanings.sent4: Currying the dish brought out its rich flavors.
meanings.sent5: They curried the vegetables to perfection.
